refnamediv.refpurpose: Trace an exponential curve between specified points.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Trace an exponential curve between specified points.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ia -- starting value. Zero is illegal for exponentials.
ib -- value after idur seconds. For exponentials, must be non-zero and must agree in sign with ia.
idur -- duration in seconds of the segment. A zero or negative value will cause all initialization to be skipped.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: These units generate control or audio signals whose values can pass through 2 specified points. The idur value may or may not equal the instrument's performance time: a shorter performance will truncate the specified pattern, while a longer one will cause the defined segment to continue on in the same direction.
